entries.deliver_neutral_hard_2: Important package needs to get to customer. Risk involved. Reliable candidates only.
entries.deliver_neutral_hard_3: I have a package that needs to get to an associate. There are factions that will try to intercept it. You better be willing to face danger for the price I'm paying.
entries.deliver_neutral_hard_4: The well being of this entire system could depend on the contents of a package I need delivered to my business partner. Can I trust you to handle it?
entries.deliver_neutral_hard_1: In need of a fast and reliable individual to make an important delivery. Those with fear of danger should not apply.
entries.deliver_neutral_hard_5: The government of this planet requires the transport of specific goods between its citizens. Be warned that criminal activity has interrupted this trade route before.
